name: Hibernated 1: This Place Is Death
description: Hibernated 1 is a pure text adventure for multiple platforms. You play as Olivia Lund, who is on the trail of one of mankind's greatest secrets and a thousand-year-old mystery. After over 200 years in hypersleep, she wakes up alone on her stranded ship, the Polaris-7. The artificial intelligence Io seems to be her only remaining friend.
alsoFor: Amiga, Amstrad CPC, Commodore 16, Plus/4, Commodore 64, DOS, MSX, ZX Spectrum | Combined View
